description: If you maintain several Jenkins environments getting insight into what happened to your Jenkins environment while it was down is critical for some users. The support core plugin captures diagnostic information to be used for understanding what happened, and with a method to reproduce issues. This lightning talk will quickly examine things like slow http requests, and an environment for trying to reproduce certain error messages.
